page.title: 03LYGON ARMS HOTEL BROADWAY
page.content: This hotel is owned by a Private Company. The first recorded registration of a guest was in 1552 but the inn was in existence prior to this. There are 10 lounges with log fires and 65 suites and double bedrooms for 130 guests. All rooms have bath, shower, toilet, central heating, telephone, television, radio, trouser press and hair drier and there is a twenty-four hour room service. Dogs are permitted. Guests stay on average two nights. 55% are from overseas. Business conferences take place from November to March. Charges:-Suites-150 per night. Double Room- 100. 3-Course set-dinner 16. There are 110 full-time staff, including 20 chefs. 75 employees live in. Staff facilities include a flat in Majorca and a holiday cottage in Devon.
